item.description:
Hi, Everybody -

Even though I will post more hikes between now and then up here in Maine, I'm getting this Meetup posted early since it falls on the holiday weekend! Instead of fighting all the tourists and traffic, let's enjoy something close to home this weekend with your fellow Not-Too-Intense-Hikers - and what can be better than a great hike, bird watch, and picnic in the wilderness areas surrounding the Ipswich River!

Here is the link to the Ipswich River Wildlife Sanctuary:

http://www.massaudubo...



We'll meet at or near the entrance / parking lot area. The directions are on the web site; please send me an e-mail if you need more information.

Be sure and pack along a big picnic lunch, coffee, and water! I'm estimating the hike and picnic will last approximately 3 hours, depending on how often we stop to watch for birds. Hike will be at a leisurely pace. Bring along a can of bug spray. Please note that the sanctuary does charge a $4 entrance fee.

Look forward to seeing you then (if not earlier in the month up here in Maine!).

Randy
RandyS@maine.rr.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will be waiting in the parking lot at or near the entrance. We will be wearing name tags.

group.name: North Shore Not Too Intense Hikers

item.name: Hike and Picnic Lunch in Ipswich!
